Is there a way to clear all banned IPs using a curl request?

Yes, you can clear all banned IPs using a curl request. Here's an example:
```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "clearbanned", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
This curl request sends a JSON RPC request to the Verus server to clear all banned IPs.

clearbanned Clear all banned IPs. Examples: > verus clearbanned > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "clearbanned", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
